```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Data
## Venues

```{r}
venues = read_rds(here("data", "venues_complete.rds"))

glimpse(venues)

```
How close is the nearest Rail Stop?

```{r}
venues |> 
  unnest(nearest_stop) |> 
  select(venue, stop_name, distance) |> 
  arrange(distance)
```

How many routes are accessible to each venue?

```{r}
venues |> 
  unnest(routes) |> 
  count(venue, name = "routes", sort=T)
```
